WARNING: This file is NOT where your settings are stored.
This file is only used to display the settings in the game.
The file you are looking for is 'settings.txt' in your saves folder.
If you want to change your settings, edit that file instead.

disasters: This may result in up to 1/3rd of your warren dying in one month.
showxp: Will turn experience: proficient into experience: proficient (151)
random med rabbit: Allow healers to be randomly selected on patrol
Healers can be selected with the patrol buttons +1, +3,+6
fading: Allow dead rabbits to fade away
After 200 months, dead rabbits will be unloaded, and saved separately. No family relations will be lost.
save_faded_copy: Save a complete copy of faded rabbits information
A complete copy of faded rabbit save info will be saved in plain-text.
backgrounds: Even with this off, the camp you choose will still affect the events you encounter.
months and seasons: Displays warren age and current warren season on several pages

captain: Allow the chief rabbit to automatically choose a new captain
Experience will be taken into account when choosing a captain.
12_month_graduation: Disable experience-based trainee graduation and rabbit growth
All trainees will graduate and all rabbits will grow at 12 months.
retirement: Rabbits will never retire due to a permanent condition
When this setting is off, rabbits with permanent conditions will choose whether or not they want to retire.
become_owsla: Allow basic rabbits and elders to choose to become owsla
Basic rabbits and elders will have a chance to become owsla upon timeskip.

affair: Allow rabbits to breed with rabbits that aren't their mates.
This will allow mated and unmated rabbits to have kittens with other rabbits they are not mated with. This includes, but is not limited to, affairs/cheating.
same sex birth: Allow couples to birth kittens despite same-sex status.
same sex adoption: If same-sex birth is disabled, this option greatly increases the chances of same-sex couples adopting.
single parentage: Allow rabbits to have kittens with an unknown second parent
Allow rabbits to have kittens with an unknown second biological parent. The rabbit will be listed as the only biological parent.
romantic with former rusasirah: Allow romantic interactions with former rusasirahs
Allows rusasirahs and the rabbits they trained to be romantic after they grow/graduate
first cousin mates: Allow first cousins to be mates and have romantic interactions
Allows rabbits with the same grandparents but different parents to become mates

by-status: The warren will be fed according their status and within the status by age.
younger first: The warren will be fed according to their age only.
less nutrition first: First the rabbits with the lowest nutrition will be fed, afterwards the warren will be fed according to their status.
harvester first: Firstly the rabbits with a harvester skill will be fed, afterwards the warren will be fed according to their status.
sick/injured first: Firstly the sick and injured rabbits will be fed, afterwards the warren will be fed according to their status.
more experience first: The warren will be fed according their experience, highest one first.
ration prey: Healthy rabbits will only eat half of the food they need, even if there is enough for the warren.

these are special. they do not have a display name or a tooltip
